28#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
29#include "config.h"
30#endif
31
32#include "SigProc_FIX.h"
33
34/* Convert int32 coefficients to int16 coefs and make sure there's no wrap-around.
35 This logic is reused in _celt_lpc(). Any bug fixes should also be applied there. */
36void silk_LPC_fit(
37 opus_int16 *a_QOUT, /* O Output signal */
38 opus_int32 *a_QIN, /* I/O Input signal */
39 const opus_int QOUT, /* I Input Q domain */
40 const opus_int QIN, /* I Input Q domain */
41 const opus_int d /* I Filter order */
42)
43{
44 opus_int i, k, idx = 0;
45 opus_int32 maxabs, absval, chirp_Q16;
46
47 /* Limit the maximum absolute value of the prediction coefficients, so that they'll fit in int16 */
48 for( i = 0; i < 10; i++ ) {
49 /* Find maximum absolute value and its index */
50 maxabs = 0;
51 for( k = 0; k < d; k++ ) {
52 absval = silk_abs( a_QIN[k] );
53 if( absval > maxabs ) {
54 maxabs = absval;
55 idx = k;
56 }
57 }
58 maxabs = silk_RSHIFT_ROUND( maxabs, QIN - QOUT );
59
60 if( maxabs > silk_int16_MAX ) {
61 /* Reduce magnitude of prediction coefficients */
62 maxabs = silk_min( maxabs, 163838 ); /* ( silk_int32_MAX >> 14 ) + silk_int16_MAX = 163838 */
63 chirp_Q16 = SILK_FIX_CONST( 0.999, 16 ) - silk_DIV32( silk_LSHIFT( maxabs - silk_int16_MAX, 14 ),
64 silk_RSHIFT32( silk_MUL( maxabs, idx + 1), 2 ) );
65 silk_bwexpander_32( a_QIN, d, chirp_Q16 );
66 } else {
67 break;
68 }
69 }
70
71 if( i == 10 ) {
72 /* Reached the last iteration, clip the coefficients */
73 for( k = 0; k < d; k++ ) {
74 a_QOUT[ k ] = (opus_int16)silk_SAT16( silk_RSHIFT_ROUND( a_QIN[ k ], QIN - QOUT ) );
75 a_QIN[ k ] = silk_LSHIFT( (opus_int32)a_QOUT[ k ], QIN - QOUT );
76 }
77 } else {
78 for( k = 0; k < d; k++ ) {
79 a_QOUT[ k ] = (opus_int16)silk_RSHIFT_ROUND( a_QIN[ k ], QIN - QOUT );
80 }
81 }
82}
